LanguageData.OE_MechUpgrade_Module_Repair_O.label: overcharged repair module
LanguageData.OE_MechUpgrade_Module_Repair_O.descripti: Overcharged module, that can be installed into mechanoid repair system, making it more efficient.\n\nThis Obsidia modification has improved efficiency but increases power consumption.
LanguageData.OE_MechUpgrade_Module_Melee_O.label: overcharged melee damage module
LanguageData.OE_MechUpgrade_Module_Melee_O.descriptio: Overcharged module, that can be installed into mechanoid, giving a large melee damage increase.\n\nThis Obsidia modification has improved efficiency but increases power consumption.
LanguageData.OE_MechUpgrade_Module_Ranged_O.label: overcharged ranged damage module
LanguageData.OE_MechUpgrade_Module_Ranged_O.descripti: Overcharged module, that can be installed into mechanoid ammo control system, giving a large ranged damage increase.\n\nThis Obsidia modification has improved efficiency but increases power consumption.
LanguageData.OE_MechUpgrade_Module_Shield_O.label: overcharged shield module
LanguageData.OE_MechUpgrade_Module_Shield_O.descripti: Overcharged module, that can be installed into mechanoid shield core, giving a large max energy increase.\n\nThis Obsidia modification has improved efficiency but increases power consumption.
